mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_AUTH_ID AS userAuthId , A.AUTH_ID AS authId , H.TENANT_ID AS tenantId , H.ENTER_CD AS enterCd , F_WTM_GET_EMP_ORG_NM(H.TENANT_ID, H.ENTER_CD, H.SABUN, H.SYMD) AS orgNm , H.SABUN AS sabun , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(H.TENANT_ID, H.ENTER_CD, H.SABUN, H.SYMD) AS empNm FROM WTM_EMP_HIS H JOIN WTM_USER_AUTH A ON H.EMP_ID = A.USER_KEY WHERE H.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} AND H.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.AUTH_ID = ${authId} AND #{ymd} BETWEEN H.SYMD AND H.EYMD
SELECT U.AUTH_ID AS authId , R.rule_text AS ruleText FROM WTM_USER_AUTH U JOIN comm_auth_rule R ON U.AUTH_ID = R.auth_id WHERE USER_KEY = F_WTM_SHA_ENCRYPT(CONCAT(${tenantId}, #{enterCd}, #{sabun}))
